translations.text: When the Inevitable Event takes place,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then no one can deny it has come.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: It will debase ˹some˺ and elevate ˹others˺.<sup foot_note=77479>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: When the earth will be violently shaken,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the mountains will be crushed to pieces,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: you will ˹all˺ be ˹divided into˺ three groups:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: the people of the right, how ˹blessed˺ will they be;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: the people of the left, how ˹miserable˺ will they be;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the foremost ˹in faith˺ will be the foremost ˹in Paradise˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: They are the ones nearest ˹to Allah˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹They will be˺ a multitude from earlier generations
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and a few from later generations.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: They will be waited on by eternal youths
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: with cups, pitchers, and a drink ˹of pure wine˺ from a flowing stream,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: that will cause them neither headache nor intoxication.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹They will also be served˺ any fruit they choose
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and meat from any bird they desire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And ˹they will have˺ maidens with gorgeous eyes,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹all˺ as a reward for what they used to do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا

translations.text: There they will never hear any idle or sinful talk—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: only good and virtuous speech.<sup foot_note=77480>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And the people of the right—how ˹blessed˺ will they be!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹They will be˺ amid thornless lote trees,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: never out of season nor forbidden—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, We will have perfectly created their mates,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: for the people of the right,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹who will be˺ a multitude from earlier generations
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and a multitude from later generations.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And the people of the left—how ˹miserable˺ will they be!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹They will be˺ in scorching heat and boiling water,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: in the shade of black smoke,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, before this ˹torment˺ they were spoiled by luxury,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and persisted in the worst of sin.<sup foot_note=77481>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَانُوا۟ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ

translations.text: They used to ask ˹mockingly˺, “When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakanoo yaqooloona a-itha mitnawakunna turaban waAAithamana-inna lamabAAoothoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Most certainly, earlier and later generations
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: will surely be gathered ˹together˺ for the appointed Day.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: will certainly eat from ˹the fruit of˺ the trees of Zaqqûm,<sup foot_note=77482>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Then on top of that you will drink boiling water—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and you will drink ˹it˺ like thirsty camels do.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: This will be their accommodation on the Day of Judgment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: It is We Who created you. Will you not then believe ˹in resurrection˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Have you considered what you ejaculate?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Is it you who create ˹a child out of˺ it, or is it We Who do so?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ

translations.text: We have ordained death for ˹all of˺ you, and We cannot be prevented
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Nahnu qaddarna baynakumualmawta wama nahnu bimasbooqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَـٰلَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِى مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: from transforming and recreating you in forms unknown to you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAala an nubaddila amthalakumwanunshi-akum fee ma la taAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.text: You already know how you were first created. Will you not then be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Have you considered what you sow?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Is it you who cause it to grow, or is it We Who do so?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ حُطَـٰمًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ

translations.text: If We willed, We could simply reduce this ˹harvest˺ to chaff, leaving you to lament,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, we have been deprived ˹of our livelihood˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Have you considered the water you drink?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنزِلُونَ

translations.text: Is it you who bring it down from the clouds, or is it We Who do so?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aantum anzaltumoohu mina almuzni am nahnualmunziloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ نَشَآءُ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ

translation.text: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful

translations.text: If We willed, We could make it salty. Will you not then give thanks?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Have you considered the fire you kindle?<sup foot_note=77483>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنشِـُٔونَ

translations.text: Is it you who produce its trees, or is it We Who do so?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translation.text: for the wayfarers in the desert

translations.text: We have made it ˹as˺ a reminder ˹of the Hellfire˺ and a provision for the travellers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So I do swear by the positions of the stars—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and this, if only you knew, is indeed a great oath—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: that this is truly a noble Quran,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: touched by none except the purified ˹angels˺.<sup foot_note=77485>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: How can you then take this message lightly,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and repay ˹Allah for˺ your provisions with denial?<sup foot_note=77486>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Why then ˹are you helpless˺ when the soul ˹of a dying person˺ reaches ˹their˺ throat,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: And We are nearer to such a person than you, but you cannot see.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanahnu aqrabu ilayhi minkum walakinla tubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Now, if you are not subject to Our Will ˹as you claim˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: bring that soul back, if what you say is true.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So, if the deceased is one of those brought near ˹to Us˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then ˹such a person will have˺ serenity, fragrance,<sup foot_note=77487>1</sup> and a Garden of Bliss.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ

translations.text: And if the deceased is one of the people of the right,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then ˹they will be told,˺ “Greetings to you from the people of the right.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

translations.text: But if such person is one of the misguided deniers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then their accommodation will be boiling water ˹to drink˺
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, this is the absolute truth.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
